attributes.action: Crack down more seriously on anti-social behaviour.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Help to address anti-social behaviour as a more serious crime.Stop members of the public being intimidated.Encourage people to act more as communities to stamp this out.Bring back local policemen to patrol the problem areas.Large estates etc.Why wait till they have done damage instead of preventing them!
